org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization

Class AbstractTextDeserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization.AbstractDeserializer
      • org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization.AbstractTextDeserializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deserializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaxJsonDeserializer, JavaxXmlDeserializer

    public abstract class AbstractTextDeserializer
extends AbstractDeserializer
    Base Text Deserializer. Implementations work on Strings, this base deserializer decode bytes in UTF-8 to produce strings. See AbstractTextSerializer.
